com.soen.risk.controller

Class RiskAttackPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen.risk.controller.RiskAttackPhase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RiskAttackPhase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Risk Attack Controller

    The Class RiskAttackPhase used to attack on different territories based on 2 different modes: a) The normal attack mode is used to attack on any adjacent territory for each player b) The all-out mode is used to attack on adjacent territories with max dice count unless any one of the attacker or defender wins.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Chirag Vora, Shashank Rao, Yogesh Nimbhorkar
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
